amendment.description: To require the Comptroller General to conduct a study on the stockpile stewardship program.

vote.text: Amendment SA 1773 agreed to in Senate by Unanimous Consent.

action.text: Amendment SA 1773 proposed by Senator McCain for Senator Kyl. (consideration: CR S8005-8017; text: CR S8013) To require the Comptroller General to conduct a study on the stockpile stewardship program.
Senate amendment proposed (on the floor): Amendment SA 1773 proposed by Senator McCain for Senator Kyl.
Senate amendment agreed to: Amendment SA 1773 agreed to in Senate by Unanimous Consent.
